医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
缺锌会增加肺部感染的风险饮食中缺锌会促进鲍曼不动杆菌引起的肺部感染；根据 11 月 15 日发表在《自然微生物学》杂志上的一项新研究，这是呼吸机相关性肺炎的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Zinc-deficiency-linked-to-increased-risk-of-lung-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Zinc-deficiency-linked-to-increased-risk-of-lung-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=632deafe-ba1a-41f6-80ab-a60b45f36748 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 23:36:45 -0500 Zinc deficiency linked to increased risk of lung infection
光脉冲有望控制癫痫发作加州大学旧金山分校、加州大学圣克鲁斯分校和加州大学伯克利分校的研究人员利用光脉冲来预防神经元中的癫痫样活动，这有一天可能成为一种新的癫痫治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Pulses-of-light-show-promise-in-controlling-seizures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Pulses-of-light-show-promise-in-controlling-seizures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7e3f081-c8d0-42a6-a0d0-8dd0ed201989 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 23:02:52 -0500 Pulses of light show promise in controlling seizures
怀孕期间的抗癫痫药物与儿童神经发育风险有关德雷克塞尔多恩西夫公共卫生学院研究人员的最新数据显示，在怀孕期间服用抗癫痫药物来控制癫痫发作和精神疾病的母亲所生的孩子可能会面临更大的神经发育疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Antiseizure-medications-during-pregnancy-linked-to-neurodevelopmental-risks-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Antiseizure-medications-during-pregnancy-linked-to-neurodevelopmental-risks-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac8597bd-9168-43e5-b5d0-a76d2c68c3dc Fri, 15 Nov 2024 22:20:14 -0500 Antiseizure medications during pregnancy linked to neurodevelopmental risks in children
研究人员发现突变如何破坏蛋白质剪接并导致疾病一个国际研究小组发现了一种对细胞蛋白质生产至关重要的新机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-how-mutations-disrupt- Protein-splicing-and-cause-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-how-mutations-disrupt- Protein-splicing-and-cause-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6612cf0a-7c94-4e08-88fc-55edd5013193 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 22:00:00 -0500 Researchers discover how mutations disrupt protein splicing and cause disease
特定的氧化还原蛋白被确定为铁死亡的关键调节因子亥姆霍兹慕尼黑的研究人员与东北大学的同事合作，发现一种特定的氧化还原蛋白是铁死亡的关键调节剂，铁死亡是一种受调节的氧化细胞死亡的形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Specific-redox- Protein-identified-as-a-ritic-regulator-of-ferroptosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Specific-redox- Protein-identified-as-a-ritic-regulator-of-ferroptosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55f6fa50-b5b7-443c-9a79-43ac7b32c00e Fri, 15 Nov 2024 21:46:00 -0500 Specific redox protein identified as a critical regulator of ferroptosis
可定制的生物传感器仅在肿瘤环境中激活癌症免疫治疗大多数癌症治疗——从化疗到工程免疫细胞——都有许多副作用，很大程度上是因为它们在针对肿瘤细胞的同时影响体内的健康细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Customized-biological-sensors-activate-cancer-immunotherapy-only-in-tumor-environments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Customized-biological-sensors-activate-cancer-immunotherapy-only-in-tumor-environments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0de30225-15d3-4398-9f72-008b8945691f Fri, 15 Nov 2024 15:04:00 -0500 Customizable biological sensors activate cancer immunotherapy only in tumor environments
研究发现患有严重疟疾的非洲儿童对青蒿素产生耐药性美国热带医学与卫生学会 (ASTMH) 年会上发表的一项新研究显示，东南亚因复杂疟疾住院的非洲儿童中发现了与青蒿素耐药性相关的疟原虫突变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Study-finds-artemisinin-resistance-in-African-children-with-severe-malaria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Study-finds-artemisinin-resistance-in-African-children-with-severe-malaria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3286df05-8603-4041-a363-118ee935a55a Fri, 15 Nov 2024 14:56:00 -0500 Study finds artemisinin resistance in African children with severe malaria
嵌合标记技术为抗击耐药感染带来新希望一项新研究开发了一种创新方法，通过用嵌合剂标记细菌来对抗抗生素耐药性细菌，从而激活针对细菌的免疫系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Chimeric-tagging-technique-offers-new-hope-in​​-the-fight-against-drug-pressive-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Chimeric-tagging-technique-offers-new-hope-in​​-the-fight-against-drug-pressive-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8af1282d-730b-4837-b4fc-2f12a4ecaacc Fri, 15 Nov 2024 14:49:00 -0500 Chimeric tagging technique offers new hope in the fight against drug-resistant infections
基于纳米线的技术检测尿液中与癌症相关的 miRNA癌症的死亡率很高，延迟诊断是其死亡的主要原因之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Nanowire-based-technology-detects-cancer-linked-miRNAs-in-urine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Nanowire-based-technology-detects-cancer-induced-miRNAs-in-urine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2e1eb3e-2423-452c-98fa-a82b17bf5a00 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 14:41:00 -0500 Nanowire-based technology detects cancer-associated miRNAs in urine
研究重点是年轻人群中慢性阻塞性肺病的进展一篇新文章称，研究人员正在探索年轻吸烟者的小气道异常如何帮助识别谁有患慢性阻塞性肺病的风险，并确定慢性肺病的进展情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Study-focuses-on-COPD-progression-in-younger-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Study-focuses-on-COPD-progression-in-younger-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80995667-ca29-442f-9d1c-e954118235d2 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 14:35:00 -0500 Study focuses on COPD progression in younger populations
